changes.description: Added focus-visible styles to toggle button
changes.details: Added 'focus-ring' class to improve keyboard navigation and focus state

patterns_discovered: Consistent use of Tailwind CSS utility classes
Dynamic className generation based on state
Responsive design with dark mode support
gotchas_discovered: Button styles differ based on groupByFacility state
Hover and focus states need to be manually managed

approach_outcome.description: Added focus-visible styles to toggle button

recommendations: Ensure focus-visible styles are consistent across all interactive elements
Consider extracting common button style logic to reduce repetition
Validate accessibility of newly added focus styles with screen readers
